dc:title: Letter to the Editor
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: A letter of apology to Monsignor McCaffery who was misrepresented in "We Plead Guilty"(above). Criticizes Commonweal for deleting part of the article which caused the misrepresentation.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 107 1958-06-13 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
